Reviews.Title: “Family week vacation, just great”
Reviews.Author: Peter M Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: Worked out just super, with kids and a big city. Great with the location of this hotel when you have kids. Also exelent that theres a great supermarked just next door with everything you need, also for the kids. And the small local bar, to the left when you come out, has exelent atmosphere and crazy low prices, as a nice change to the prices around la Rambla. All good

Reviews.Title: “Great Property, Location and Service”
Reviews.Author: Jennifer C
Reviews.Content: Our flight arrived in Barcelona much earlier than planned, so we arrived at Grandom Suites earlier than anticipated. The desk clerk let us check in mid-morning since the room was ready. A hotel would never have been so accommodating! The staff at the front desk were always helpful. The apartment has more amenities than a hotel, including a full kitchen with dishes, a clothes washer, and a spacious balcony with a table and chairs. There are complimentary light snacks for breakfast. The location is fantastic - within walking distance of many great sites. I highly recommend Grandom Suites.

Reviews.Title: “Bag of Bad Surprises”
Reviews.Author: sb1099
Reviews.Content: We stayed in 3 different rooms – Room 401, Room 202, and Room 302 (in that order) in Grandom, over 3 nights. We made our reservation through booking.com, over a month prior to our arrival, for a 2 bedroom suite at Splendom Suites (same company apparently but not the same hotel) for 2 adults and 2 children. Upon arrival, I was told by Julio at reception that booking.com sent them the reservation for 2 adults only, and that Splendom was completely sold out so he would have to put us in Grandom Suites instead (2 blocks away). Booking.com insist they sent the reservation correctly. Julio put us in a 2 bedroom 1 bath 4th floor unit (Room 401) unit. There was no water in the unit when we moved in so we could not even use the bathroom – I was told that this was a temporary issue affecting the entire area and not just the hotel, and that the utility company was responsible. As we were still waiting for the water to come back, they voluntarily located another 2 bedroom 1.5 bath unit (Room 202) for us. We took a look at it - it had the extra ½ bath, and the water magically seemed to be running fine, so we agreed to move. Room 202 was yet to be cleaned however, and was being ‘renovated’. We repacked our luggage and they moved it to Room 202. The renovation plans included painting the room, AFTER we ‘approved’ it – we found that out only when we returned to the suite later that evening to the strong smell of paint. We tried taking a shower, but the water was cold. We tried calling reception, but the phone in the room was not working. Grandom Suites has no person at the reception after 7 PM, the reception desk is at Splendom 2 blocks away so we had to walk there to ask our question. Susanna came immediately and fixed the phone, and also took a look at the wifi which was not working (but was not able to fix it). I was tossing in bed all night with a headache, with the smell of fresh paint. The next day, the lukewarm water ran out when my 4-year old was in the shower, I had to rinse him in cold water. Reception was only too willing to come and take a look, as usual, and offer an explanation – that we had to wait 15 to 20 minutes between showers for the water to heat up again. So we waited an hour, and when the water did not heat up, just left after informing reception. When we returned that afternoon, we were told that the boiler needed to be replaced. That they did not know how much time it would take, because they would have to first source the boiler. But there was another room they could move us to. To their credit, they packed all our stuff and moved it, this time to room 302, with no paint smell and with plenty of hot water. However, for the remainder of our 1.5 day stay, we dreaded coming back to the hotel; we did not know what we would come back to. Other comments: Wireless internet does not work (see photo of router - not sure whether signal strength is clearly visible in photo). The door to the second bedroom does not open fully, (see photo). There is no headboard in the second bedroom, only pillows. I moved one of the pillows to find a power outlet behind it, (see photo). There is a smell in some of the bathrooms – poor drainage possibly. No alarm clock in any of the rooms. The location of the apartments is good. Grandom costs significantly less than Splendom for the same room category, when we asked for a price adjustment we did not receive a response. When I asked to speak to their manager, one person said he was having lunch. Another said he was in Madrid, yet another said he was not in yet. Everyone at the hotel was calm and polite, with a lack of urgency or empathy, that gave me the impression they knew all along that things were wrong in the apartment. We travel to Europe frequently, and have never had this bad an experience. I would not recommend this hotel to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, friendly staff, everything you could need.”
Reviews.Author: Raquers82
Reviews.Content: The apartment it in a good location in a nice area, with a supermarket on the other side of the square, cafe and a bar practically next door.The staff were very friendly and there were plenty of leaflets, booklets and maps with information on places to visit. The apartment itself was very clean and had everything you could need if self catering. I read other people's reviews on here before booking and can't understand the issues with the free snack room(it's free!!!). Also read a few issue's like door to 2nd bedroom not opening fully and no hairdryer. These issues had been resolved when we visited, which shows the staff are dedicated to improving guest experience. Overall comment, great and at £55.00 per night on late rooms a bargain.

Reviews.Title: “beautiful and grand”
Reviews.Author: geebee56
Reviews.Content: we visited in july with children age 11 and 7 the staff were fantastic, helpful polite, accomodating. our appartment was beautiful with stunning views over the city,you are at the heart of everything. only draw back was the lack of a lock on the window as hioghts and adventurous boys dont mix! Snack room was good for a quick bite. would highly reccomend it to anyone visiting the city. we stayed for 6 nights, wish it was longer.

Reviews.Title: “A very nice stay”
Reviews.Author: Anna_umea
Reviews.Content: I travelled with two friends for a long weekend and I am more than happy with my choice of hotel. As we arrived to the hotel the staff came to the reception within 5 minutes and checked us in. We got two keys to share which was fine. We had a two bedroom apartment with two toilets, a living room, balcony and a seperate kitchen all in all about 70 m2 -more than enough for 3 people for 3 nights! The second bedroom was a bit on the small and dark side though and could have used a sliding door rather than a regular one since it didn't open up properly because the bed was in the way. The second room could also benefit from some TLC in general... The apartment was fitted with 2 air conditioners that for us was needed to heat the room since the nights got a bit chilly. The area was safe and it was close to supermarket, bank, bakery and other amenities. It was just a short walk to get to La Rambla. The bud from the airport stops at the university whish is only about a 5 minute walk away from the hotel. The apartment was well furnished with nice decor but would have needed a coat of paint and some minor doing ups.

Reviews.Title: “Far better than a hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Greg3802
Reviews.Content: We rented two flats for a single evening (4+ bedrooms) for €190, couldn't believe how nice it was. Great location. Easy walk to Catalunya Plaza where the tour buses are. Great neighborhood. Easy parking situation and pretty much a straight shot to the airport. We'll definitely be back!

Reviews.Title: “3 Bedroom Apartment great for families”
Reviews.Author: cbtorontocanada
Reviews.Content: We spent 5 days in August pre-cruise and enjoyed the location and property. Espresso machine and snacks were nice and the full service kitchen was very convenient. close to a grocery store, Placa Catalunya and Las Rambles, make this an ideal home base. Friendly staff , clean and safe location.

Reviews.Title: “Great place for five adults!”
Reviews.Author: JMP0711
Reviews.Content: We wanted to spend a couple of days in Barcelona before heading out on a cruise and I was looking for options that would more economically accommodate our group of 5 adults. I found this terrific property through Trip Advisor. This is a hotel consisting of a number of fully furnished apartments. If you are looking for a traditional hotel with bar, restaurant, etc., this is not for you. If you are looking for larger accommodations for a group, then this is great! Our apartment had 3 bedrooms, 2 baths (one is a half-bath) and a small, fully equipped kitchen. It was very, very clean, nicely decorated and appropriately furnished. Two of the bedrooms had twin beds pushed together and the third one had a twin bed. A couple of the bedrooms are small, but you only sleep there, right? The living room/dining area is good-sized, and had a large dining table, sofa, chair, coffee table, and flat screen tv. There was a small balcony area, which we did not use. It was fully air conditioned. We opted to get the 10-12 euro "Welcome Package" of drinks and snacks, and that was a very good value. There are also free snacks, orange juice, coffee and tea available in the hotel's pantry at all times. Due to flight delays we arrived several hours after we planned to, so there was no one on duty at the entrance. But we just pushed the button to the side of the door (it is marked) and let the person who answered know we had arrived. Within about 5 minutes a lovely young woman arrived from the nearby Splendom hotel. She checked us in, showed us around the apartment, and gave us good advice about the city and sights nearby. The hotel is located in a nice area of town, reasonably safe at night, and within 5-10 minutes walking distance of the subway, Placa Catalunya and the top of La Ramblas. There are numerous restaurants and coffee shops very close to the hotel. During the day, the desk at the entrance is staffed. The person on duty when we were there was fun to talk to and very knowledgeable and helpful. He was able to get us taxis to the cruise ship on a day when the taxi system was being overwhelmed by 7 cruise ships! We would definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: V_Chhabra
Reviews.Content: Very clean and comfortable apartments with small kitchenette. Perfect with small children. Helpful staff. Good location. Short walk from the Centre of the town and ramblas. Free internet and a freeh 24 hour refreshment room. Would go to stay again in these apartments.

Reviews.Title: “Horrible service, no hot water, tiny sad 2nd room”
Reviews.Author: dotrangerl
Reviews.Content: Ripe-off on Hotel pick-ups: Please DO NOT arrange car service with this hotel. Before the trip we heard a lot of stories about how dangerous to take a street taxi from airport to hotel so we arrange shuttle service with Grandom Suite. They told me it will be $60 Euro each way, $120 Euro both way. I specify in the email and asked if is a street yellow taxi and they told me no. On the day of arrival the driver pick us up from the airport and take us to his car and there was the yellow street taxi!!!! Why would I paid $60 Euro for a street taxi??? We later find out that it only costed $30 Euro by taxi from airport to hotel!!! After arrival at the suite we asked the manger about the car service, he just told me that he doesn't know and left me without any explanation. We totally got ripe-off and not happy with the way they handled this. Horrible service: One of employee Javier's attitude is unbelievable, when we had a misunderstanding of the room rates his attitude was horrible. He slammed the credit card machine and tell me to pay!!! Later he even charged it wrong and had credit back my money. It was very unprofessional. After the taxi and room rates disaster I thought the day will be better but NO. We found out our room's hair dyer was broken, we called from 5PM and ask for a replacement, Javier keep telling us to give him 10 minutes. After 2 hours, he finally showed up and tell us it's not possible to get a hair dyer. He told me he was very busy since a lot of people are checking in and there's no way he can get one for us. I flipped because first of all you don't ask for a hair dryer for 2 hours and I know you are busy with checking in people but it's really not my problem. I'm here in Barcelona for vacation not here waiting for a hair dryer. Second, when we waited for 2 hours you do NOT just show up and tell me it's not possible. After I got angry and demand him, he finally found one for us but it wasted half of the day and ruined my first day in Barcelona. No hot water after the second wash: After all the terrible things we stared to take shower and after the second person there's no hot water, we waited more then 2 hours to have not even hot just warm water again. After the forth person finish taken shower it was 2AM in the morning and we had to get up 9AM in the morning. We wasted so much time dealing with all the problems with Grandom Suite and it's not worth it. Once again we're here to vacation not wasting time on their unprofessionalism. Very small 2nd Room: The second room was very very small, the door cannot even open!!! I'm tiny already (5 feet tall) however I was almost overlap on top of my friend. Not for two adults, only for one adult and one kid or two kids. No response with my email: After the stay, I wrote an email to the manger with all the problems I had with their hotel, there's no response. Maybe I have to write a review in order for them to recognize their problems.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing Place to Stay!”
Reviews.Author: JennyMac831
Reviews.Content: Great location, large rooms, full kitchen and the service is great. Beyond what we were expecting with wonderful amenities! I sprained my ankle the second to last day of our trip and the hotel staff was so kind. They brought ice, propped up my foot and really went out of their way. Lots of cafes and restaurants near by. For sure try Hanoi right next door.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly Surprised”
Reviews.Author: MalouNewJersey
Reviews.Content: I was pleasantly surprised by the location and room. The kids were very happy with the location and cleanliness of the room. There is plenty of space for our family - the kitchenette was very useful with small children. I would recommend staying here if you are looking for an affordable place to stay in a good location. There are plenty of shops and restaurants within walking distance. The staff is super nice and accommodating. The free wifi was a plus. The only negative aspect worth mentioning is the noise level from the upstairs apartment - during my stay. The noise was not overly intrusive; however, if you are a light sleeper - this may be a concern.

Reviews.Title: “I will definitely come back!!”
Reviews.Author: Luv_Europe39
Reviews.Content: Great place. Our room had just been painted so it was immaculate. We had a kitchenette with 2 bedrooms for only $99 a night! And after staying in small cramped rooms in both Rome and Paris, it felt like we were in a mansion. Complimentary breakfast was included, but nothing to brag about. In room coffee, was a nice addition as well. The location was superb. I will definitely return with family in tow.

Reviews.Title: “Great apartments, easy location, playground for kids”
Reviews.Author: nnwj
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 4 nights with our 2 sons 3 and 5. There was a decent supermarket on the square, playground and tge snack room on the ground floor. Room was lovely, second room small but plenty big enough for our purpose. We stated on first floor at back, decent patio area. Staff all really nice

Reviews.Title: “good value-great place”
Reviews.Author: Adry2010
Reviews.Content: Nice location,close to facilities(nearset metro Universitat),fully equiped kitchen,great apartment,cleaned,spacious,quiet place. Helpfull staff. Me,mum&boyfriend stoos in Grandom Suites flat 2@3rd floor (had 2 bathrooms,1 big living room with Lcd tv,2 bedrooms,great kitchen +a snaking room @ the G floor (muffins,coffee,all good bits) The only probl. we encountered was the smell that camed from master bedroom toilet(i think the draining had some probl). In general all was spot on. Grandom Suites Tel:+34934511024(Plaza Dr.Letamendi 26 Barcelona) Splendon Suites Tel:+34934521030(Calle Valencia 194 Barcelona) In case u don't find someone @ the reception call and they will come in 5 min( we did reach late @ the hotel so we called to gain acces) Seriously is a great place.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, compact apartment”
Reviews.Author: jadedmum
Reviews.Content: Fourth floor rear apartment, overdue for redecoration (mould on the bathroom ceiling, scuff marks everywhere). TIny second bedroom - bedroom door wouldn't open past the bed. Only bathroom was en suite although there was a second toilet. Fully functioning kitchen with washing machine. Big screen telly with lots of Spanish channels. Great location, kids loved the Snack Room. Stayed one night at a bargain rate, would have been throroughly disappointed if we'd paid full whack.

Reviews.Title: “Great place great rate”
Reviews.Author: sandramidlothian
Reviews.Content: We were unfortunatly only here for one night, a quick trip to Barcelona, to escape the hotel we had booked in santa susanna!!!! enjoyed our night here, only regret is we did not book for 2 nights. Everything you need, very clean and modern. A great rate.
